#Objects

a point
b point
c point
d point
g point
l point

lbc line
lab line
lad line
lbd line
lal line
lbg line

cb circle
cd circle

#Relations

start_point(a, lab)
end_point(b, lab)

start_point(b, lbc)
end_point(c, lbc)

start_point(a, lad)
end_point(d, lad)

start_point(b, lbd)
end_point(d, lbd)

start_point(a, lal)
end_point(l, lal)

start_point(b, lbg)
end_point(g, lbg)

length_equal(lab, lad)
length_equal(lab, lbd)

collinear(l, lad)
collinear(g, lbd)

centre(b,cb)
coincident(c,cb)

centre(d,cd)
coincident(g,cd)
